title: Yasuo Skin IDEA
body:
{{champion:157}}
 Hear me out, A tennis themed skin. replace sword with a Racket, the Outfit would look tennis with sweat band shorts and shirt fitting in with the Dunkmaster Darius skin,  

Way of the Wander shield could take the shape of a see-through tennis ball
Steel Tempest could still be a whirlwind but with a tennis ball in the center spinning like it created the whirling / apart of it
Wind Wall Could be a Giant Racket Head that comes out of the ground with the sound of a racket "Thunk"
Sweeping Blade counter on target could be tennis shaped  and the knock up him spin -hitting a ball with his racket
Last Breath He could Dive over swinging furiously at a tennis racket and ball that he bounces off of them while Airborne

Backing could be that he setup to serve and then while missing his tennis ball he starts to look around. when he gets to base ball hits him in the head

that is as far as I got
tell me what you think
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
maybe :P but i think it's a great skin to do for him, add a little humor to his otherwise way serious skins.
 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
yes but the skin can be just for fun, like definately not blitzcrank or Pool Party, but i value the feedback
Ya no... I don't want yasuo to be a tennis player he is a samurai on a journey to find his master's killer ok. He aint got time for no tennis game{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
